Specific Details: Request to forward invite to participate in European Elections Hustings organised by Coalition 2030 to Regina Doherty (FG), MEP candidate
DPOs Lobbied: Maeve O'Connell|Councillor|Dun Laoghaire-Rathdown County Council::Regina Doherty|Senator|Seanad
Subject Matter: Request to forward invite to participate in European Elections Hustings organised by Coalition 2030 to Regina Doherty (FG), MEP candidate
Intended Results: Regina Doherty would participate in the European Election Hustings organised by Coalition 2030.
Lobbying Activities:
Sent WhatsApp message to local councillor for Stillorgan, Maeve O'Connell (FG), on 15th April to ask her to invite Regina Doherty to the Coalition 2030 European Election hustings on 18th April.
